remarks: A restriction to a singleton with a function value is a function under certain conditions.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-Jul-2017.)
statement: funressnfv $p |- ( ( ( X e. dom ( F o. G ) /\ Fun ( ( F o. G ) |` { X } ) ) /\ ( G Fn A /\ X e. A ) ) -> Fun ( F |` { ( G ` X ) } ) ) $.
